sources.title: Horror Express
sources.description: In 1906, on a train racing through Siberia, Christopher Lee and Peter Cushing are engulfed in nightmare when a frozen missing link comes to life. You can load the mpeg2 file into DVDAuthorGUI (a free program) and, with the push of a button, quickly create the structure of a DVD to watch on your television (after burning with ImgBurn or the like).

sources.title: Horror Express (1972)
sources.description: Mysterious and unearthly deaths start to occur while Professor Saxton is transporting the frozen remains of a primitive humanoid creature he found in Manchuria back to Europe. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/horror-express-1972/

sources.title: Horror Express (1972)
sources.description: Horror Express is a 1972 science fiction horror film directed by Eugenio Martín. It stars Christopher Lee and Peter Cushing, with Alberto de Mendoza, Silvia Tortosa, Julio Peña, George Rigaud, Ángel del Pozo, and Telly Savalas in supporting roles. Set in 1906, a British anthropologist named Professor Sir Alexander Saxton discovers a frozen humanoid in Manchuria and transports it on the Trans-Siberian Express. As the creature thaws, it reveals itself to be a parasitic alien that absorbs the memories of its victims, leading to a series of murders aboard the train, while Saxton and his rival, Dr. Wells, race to stop the creature before it claims more lives.

sources.title: Horror_Express

sources.title: Horror-Express (HORROR FILM with CHRISTOPHER LEE, Sci Fi Horror Films in German, Alien Horror Films)

metadata.Plot: An English anthropologist has discovered a frozen monster in the frozen wastes of Manchuria which he believes may be the Missing Link. He brings the creature back to Europe aboard a trans-Siberian express, but during the trip the monster thaws out and starts to butcher the passengers one by one.
metadata.Actors: Christopher Lee, Peter Cushing, Alberto de Mendoza
